#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
const int maxn = 1e3+10;
int n,a[maxn][maxn],m,p;
long long f[2][maxn][maxn],g[maxn][maxn],ans;
int main(){
    scanf("%d%d%d",&n,&m,&p);
    for (int i=1; i<=n; i++)
    for (int j=1; j<=m; j++) scanf("%d",&a[i][j]);
    for (int i=0; i<=n+1; i++) g[i][0]=g[i][m+1]=-1e18;
    for (int j=0; j<=m+1; j++) g[0][j]=g[n+1][j]=-1e18;
    g[n][m]=a[n][m];
    for (int i=n-1; i>=1; i--) g[i][m]=g[i+1][m]+1LL*a[i][m];
    for (int j=m-1; j>=1; j--) g[n][j]=g[n][j+1]+1LL*a[n][j];
    for (int i=n-1; i>=1; i--)
    for (int j=m-1; j>=1; j--) g[i][j]=max(g[i+1][j],g[i][j+1])+1LL*a[i][j];
    ans=-1e18;
    f[0][1][1]=f[1][1][1]=a[1][1];ans=g[1][1];
    for (int j=2; j<=m; j++){
        f[0][1][j]=f[0][1][j-1]+1LL*a[1][j];
        f[1][1][j]=-1e18;
        ans=max(ans,max(f[0][1][j],f[1][1][j])-1LL*a[1][j]+g[1][j]);
    }
    for (int i=2; i<=n; i++){
        f[0][i][1]=-1e18;
        f[1][i][1]=f[1][i-1][1]+1LL*a[i][1];
        ans=max(ans,max(f[0][i][1],f[1][i][1])-1LL*a[i][1]+g[i][1]);
    }
    for (int i=2; i<=n; i++)
    for (int j=2; j<=m; j++){
        f[0][i][j]=max(f[0][i][j-1],f[1][i][j-1])+1LL*a[i][j];
        f[1][i][j]=max(f[0][i-1][j],f[1][i-1][j])+1LL*a[i][j];
        ans=max(ans,max(f[0][i][j],f[1][i][j])-1LL*a[i][j]+g[i][j]);
        ans=max(ans,f[0][i][j]-1LL*p+1LL*a[i-1][j]+max(g[i-1][j+1],max(g[i][j+1],g[i+1][j])));
        ans=max(ans,f[0][i][j]-1LL*p+g[i+1][j-1]);
        ans=max(ans,f[1][i][j]-1LL*p+1LL*a[i][j-1]+max(g[i+1][j-1],max(g[i+1][j],g[i+1][j])));
        ans=max(ans,f[1][i][j]-1LL*p+g[i-1][j+1]);
    }
    cout<<ans;
}
